description:
You’re on a boat surrounded by army fleet. They are preparing to destroy the submarine.

The submarine is attacked with alien form of sickness. And soon it will spread everywhere. Search for oxygen to survive.

You have to send nuclear codes and SOS signal. It’s your only chance to prevent submarine destruction while you onboard.

===

It was the first jam for us. Tried to go for something atmospheric and creepy. Made on LibGDX with java. All models and textures has been created by us. Hope you will like it.

Music for the game has been created by I.Modlinski: 

Listen on Soundcloud
